features: 1. Remove Password: This USB key is used to reset login passwords and is compatible with Windows 2000, XP, Vista,7,8.1,10,11,server and any PC brands such as HP,Dell,Lenovo,Samsung,Toshiba,Sony,Acer,Asus.
2. Easy to Use: No need to change settings and no internet needed.Reset passwords in minutes for user who already knows how to boot from USB drive.

3. Bootable Key: To remove login password, user needs to boot computer from this USB key and it supports legacy BIOS/UEFI, secure boot mode as well as 32/64bits PC/OS and it should work with most of brands’ laptop and desktop.
4. Tech Support: Please follow instructions in the print User Guide.Feel free to ask tech support when user has an issue.

5. Limits: It only can remove password for local accounts and local credential of Microsoft accounts. Caution: this key CAN'T remove BIOS Password and can't decrypt bitlocker data without recovery key.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can not believe this actually worked. I’ve had my computer 10-15 years and tried every password I can possibly think of going through old papers trying to recover it and nothing. I really didn’t wana keep an old useless laptop around. I also didn’t wana get rid of it because there was some things in there I wanted to retrieve. I’ve asked around and finally someone mentioned this key. My mind is blown. It did take awhile to figure out and I didn’t think it worked but much of it was because I was trying to YouTube it was to something specific on my computer which only complicated things more as they weren’t exactly what I was trying to do but it did help with the boot and getting to the screen I needed after that I got the understanding and read the instructions. No longer have to get rid of the computer and it’ll no longer be sitting around…now I have to find out how to move the Info off this computer to my newer one 😪
